sections.label: Verse
sections.content:
I know that time heals pain,  
But the weight of the past still lingers in my veins.

sections.label: Pre-Chorus
sections.content:
Every scar a lesson, every wound a song,  
The echoes of my story still play on.
The rhythm of my struggle is a story
The melody sounds holy

sections.label: Chorus
sections.content:
I'm all alone, and I'm thinkin' maybe there's be a reason
Time moves slow, yeah I'm leavin' cause no one believes in me

sections.label: Verse 2
sections.content: I hope that someday the mirror shows me I will be ok
